meanings.sent1: The mushroom had a clavate stem.
meanings.sent2: The clavate rock formation stood out among the others.
meanings.sent3: The clavate tree branch looked like a tiny club.
meanings.sent4: Her clavate fingers grasped the handle tightly.
meanings.sent5: The clavate cloud in the sky resembled a giant club swinging.

meanings.sent1: The clavate flower petals were vibrant in color.
meanings.sent2: The bird had clavate feathers at the end of its wings.
meanings.sent3: The clavate balloon floated gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent4: His clavate nose turned red from the cold.
meanings.sent5: The clavate icicle sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The clavate hammer was perfect for the job.
meanings.sent2: The clavate tail of the lizard thumped against the ground.
meanings.sent3: The clavate pencil rolled off the table.
meanings.sent4: Her clavate shoes made her feet look big.
meanings.sent5: The clavate shadow cast by the streetlight looked like a weapon.
